Reviews.Title: good enclosed security camera...
Reviews.Author: Ratatouille "Vinny"
Reviews.Content: I have installed 4 of these cameras for a client.  The DVR system we ordered came with 8 bullet cameras.  However, he's got low ceilings and felt the bullet camera could easily be vandalized.  As such, we ordered this camera, which is protected by the dome.  The image/video captured by this unit is very clear.  The unit comes with cables (50ft I believe), connectors and a power adapter.Installation is very straight forward, and the mounting bracket installs easily.  Definitely a good quality product.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Swann has great products I would reconmend this camera to my many clients. Buy it and I'll install it today!!
